channel.title: Homes on The Li Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on The Li Lab

item.title: The Li Lab @ GWU
item.description: Welcome to the Nanophotonics and Microfluidics Lab at GW!

About Our Group We are a research group at The George Washington University focusing on nanophotonics and microfluidics. Our group is part of the Biomedical Engineering department. We are currently comprised of both graduate and undergraduate students. Some of our projects include a lab-on-a-chip and a wearable ECG ring. We are actively working on a few different projects at this time in collaboration with multiple groups.

item.title: Recent Publications
item.description: More Publications coming soon. A full list can be found here.
